meanings.definition: In a way that relates to or involves magnetism.
meanings.sent1: The metal piece was drawn towards the magnet magnetically.
meanings.sent2: The compass needle pointed northward magnetically.
meanings.sent3: The paperclips danced around the magnet magnetically.
meanings.sent4: Her personality attracted people to her like a magnet magnetically.
meanings.sent5: The magnetic force pulled the iron filings towards it magnetically.

meanings.definition: In a way that attracts or repels other objects due to magnetic properties.
meanings.sent1: The two magnets pushed each other away magnetically.
meanings.sent2: The refrigerator door closed automatically magnetically.
meanings.sent3: The toy car seemed to have a mind of its own, moving around magnetically.
meanings.sent4: The positive and negative charges interacted magnetically.
meanings.sent5: The magnetic field around the bar magnet affected nearby objects magnetically.
